official_title: To amend the National Manufactured Housing Construction and Safety Standards Act of 1974 to require each manufactured home to be equipped with a shutoff valve for the water heater supply line.

summary.text: Amends the National Manufactured Housing Construction and Safety Standards Act of 1974 to require each manufactured home to be equipped with a water heater supply line shutoff value.
